import { Paper, Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Box } from '@mui/system' import React from 'react' function TotalPrice({ cart }) { return ( PRICE DETAILS
Price(2items) ₹{cart.bill} Discount -₹0 Delivery Charges ₹40
TOTAL AMOUNT ₹{40+cart.bill} ) } export default TotalPrice
